product_name: The North Face Dolomite 3S Sleeping Bag - Kids'
long_description: For your pint-size pipsqueak, the kid-size Dolomite 3S synthetic summer sleeping bag from The North Face provides lightweight performance across a wide range of temperatures and uses. Heatseeker(TM) insulation offers a great warmth-to-weight ratio, is highly compressible and is extremely durable, making it ideal for cold weather. Bag can be completely unzipped and opened up for use as a comforter. Features a zippered internal watch pocket to keep small necessities within easy reach. Shell is constructed of soft, ripstop nylon; polyester taffeta lining is soft next to skin. The North Face Dolomite 3S sleeping bag includes a roll-top stuff sack.
short_description: For your pint-size pipsqueak, the kid-size Dolomite 3S synthetic summer sleeping bag from The North Face provides lightweight performance across a wide range of temperatures and uses.
